title: My rune pages are bugged
body:
My last 2 rune pages don't work correctly, they always have the same name and stats as each other no matter what i do to them. Then when I go into champion select, when I pick either of them, the rune page selector immediately jumps to the first rune page on my list. It started around patch 7.6.

I have reported the bug and opened a ticket

However after digging through these boards I have found a few people with the same problem and one of the "player support specialists" in particular seems to know what the problem is:

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/v2KAiEUE-bugged-runes

Something about the 2 runes pages being "tied together" 

Thank you in advance for any help that you can offer.

replies.body: i have the same issue i cant use my last 2 rune pages {{item:3070}}

Thanks for noticing me senpai! {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}} 

I went ahead and checked out your account (thanks for that clever way of pointing out the buggy rune pages lol) and those rune pages should be fixed now! Hit me back up if you're still having issues ^_^!
I am also having this problem and it is quite annoying... T.T

I'm having the same problem with the new client.  Please help. please fix it before Legacy Client Officially Retires on April 24. 
Thank you.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=25PZG1B5,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-04-10T22:26:30.359+0000)
>
> Thanks for noticing me senpai! {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}} 
> 
> I went ahead and checked out your account (thanks for that clever way of pointing out the buggy rune pages lol) and those rune pages should be fixed now! Hit me back up if you're still having issues ^_^!

Same problem with rune pages 2 and 3. 
If you have time can you look into this and please fix it.
I'm also having the same problem pls help me

I'm also having the same problem.  I have to use the legacy client to avoid this problem. Please help.
Thanks.

I am also having this issue, but its with any 2 rune pages I place as 10/11 in my list they either both show up as the same name, and I cant select them or one of them doesn't show up, when selecting them in lobby

Currently having the exact same problem with my account, 2 of my pages are linked and it's resulting in me going into games with bugged pages or no runes, can you please look into this and hopefully fix it?

SAME PROBLEM
FIX ALL OUR ACCOUNTS RITO
It now works perfectly! Thank you very much =D
